957810.name: Season of War (Beta)
957810.description:
Season of War (Beta) is a dynamic 2D arcade RPG/twin-stick shooter RPG with an individually developed combat system from SinorCreate.

You will find an exciting combination of two genres, where the variability of pumping and abilities is combined with fast, reactive battles that require strategic thinking.

Ideal for those who are looking for dynamic gameplay and want to "kill time", enjoying pleasant 2D graphics with an unusual perspective, atmospheric music and sound.

The game requires immediate strategic decisions, and the gradual discovery of abilities and battles with interesting bosses will make the passage unforgettable.

At the moment, the game is short: there is no plot, and only 5 missions.

However, Season of War is constantly improving.

In 2025, the plot will be rebuilt and filmed, and in 2026, the game will be replenished with a significantly larger number of missions and will be released in full.
